data.name: q1
data.value: Is your device INVASIVE or NON-INVASIVE?

data.name: q1_1
data.value: Is it intended for channelling or storing blood, body liquids, cells or tissues, liquids or gases for the purpose of eventual infusion, administration or introduction into the body?

data.name: q1_1_1
data.value: May it be connected to an active medical device in class IIa or a higher class?

data.name: q1_1_2
data.value: Is it intended for use for storing or channelling blood or other body liquids or for storing organs, parts of organs or body cells and tissues, but it is not a blood bag?

data.name: q1_1_3
data.value: Is it a blood bag?

data.name: q1_1_4
data.value: Is it intended for modifying the biological or chemical composition of human tissues or cells, blood, other body liquids or other liquids intended for implantation or administration into the body?

data.name: q1_1_4_1
data.value: Does the treatment consist of filtration, centrifugation or exchanges of gas, heat?

data.name: q1_1_4_2
data.value: Is the treatment other than filtration, centrifugation or exchanges of gas, heat?

data.name: q1_1_4_3
data.value: Is your device a substance or a mixture of substances intended to be used in vitro in direct contact with human cells, tissues or organs taken off from the human body or with human embryos before their implantation or administration into the body?

data.name: q1_1_5
data.value: Is it intended come into contact with injured skin or mucous membrane?

data.name: q1_1_5_1
data.value: Is it intended to be used as a mechanical barrier, for compression or for absorption of exudates?

data.name: q1_1_5_2
data.value: Is it intended to be used principally for injuries to skin which have breached the dermis or mucous membrane and can only heal by secondary intent?

data.name: q1_1_5_3
data.value: Is it principally intended to manage the micro-environment of injured skin or mucous membrane?

data.name: q2_1
data.value: Is it NON-SURGICALLY INVASIVE or SURGICALLY INVASIVE?

data.name: q2_1_1
data.value: Is it NOT intended for connection to any active medical device?

data.name: q2_1_1_1
data.value: Is it intended for transient use?

data.name: q2_1_2
data.value: It is intended for connection to an active medical device of class:

data.name: q2_1_2_1
data.value: Is it intended for transient use?

data.name: q2_1_2_2
data.value: Is it intended for short-term use?

data.name: q2_1_2_4
data.value: Is it intended for long-term use?

data.name: q2_2_1
data.value: What is the time length of its use?

data.name: q2_2_1_1
data.value: Is it intended specifically to control, diagnose, monitor or correct a defect of the heart or of the central circulatory system through direct contact with those parts of the body?

data.name: q2_2_1_2
data.value: Is it a reusable surgical instrument?

data.name: q2_2_1_3
data.value: Is it intended specifically for use in direct contact with the heart or central circulatory system or the central nervous system?

data.name: q2_2_1_4
data.value: Is it intended to supply energy in the form of ionizing radiation?

data.name: q2_2_1_5
data.value: Is it intended to have a biological effect or be wholly or mainly absorbed?

data.name: q2_2_1_6
data.value: Is it intended to administer medicinal products by means of a delivery system in a manner that is potentially hazardous?

data.name: q2_2_2_1
data.value: Is it intended specifically to control, diagnose, monitor or correct a defect of the heart or of the central circulatory system through direct contact with those parts of the body?

data.name: q2_2_2_2
data.value: Is it intended specifically for use in direct contact with the heart or central circulatory system or the central nervous system?

data.name: q2_2_2_4
data.value: Is it intended to have a biological effect or be wholly or mainly absorbed?

data.name: q2_2_2_5
data.value: Is it intended to undergo chemical change in the body?

data.name: q2_2_2_5_3
data.value: Is it intended to administer medicines?

data.name: q2_2_3_1
data.value: Is it intended to be placed in the teeth?

data.name: q2_2_3_2
data.value: Is it intended for use in direct contact with the heart or central circulatory system or the central nervous system?

data.name: q2_2_3_3
data.value: Is it intended to have a biological effect or be wholly or mainly absorbed?

data.name: q2_2_3_4
data.value: Is it intended to undergo chemical change in the body?

data.name: q2_2_3_5
data.value: Is it intended to administer medicines?

data.name: q2_2_3_6
data.value: Is it an active implantable device or its accessory?

data.name: q2_2_3_7
data.value: Is it a breast implant?

data.name: q2_2_3_8
data.value: Is it a surgical mesh?

data.name: q2_2_3_9
data.value: Is it a total or partial joint replacement?

data.name: q2_2_3_10
data.value: Is it an ancillary component of a total or partial joint replacement such as screws, wedges, plates and instruments?

data.name: q2_2_3_11
data.value: Is it a spinal disc replacement implant?

data.name: q2_2_3_12
data.value: Is it an implantable device that come into contact with the spinal column?

data.name: q2_2_3_13
data.value: Is it an ancillary component of a spinal disc replacement or other device that comes in contact with the spinal column such as screws, wedges, plates and instruments?

data.name: q3
data.value: Is your device ACTIVE?

data.name: q3_1
data.value: Is it therapeutic?

data.name: q3_1_1
data.value: Does it administer energy to or exchange energy with the human body?

data.name: q3_1_3
data.value: Is it intended to emit ionizing radiation?

data.name: q3_1_4
data.value: Is it intended for therapeutic radiology, including interventional radiology devices and devices which control or monitor such devices, or which directly influence their performance?

data.name: q3_1_5
data.value: Is it intended to control or monitor a device that emits ionizing radiation, or does it directly influence the performance a device that emits ionizing radiation?

data.name: q3_2
data.value: Is it intended to control or monitor the performance of active therapeutic class IIb devices, or intended directly to influence the performance of such devices?

data.name: q3_3
data.value: Is it intended for controlling, monitoring or directly influencing the performance of active implantable devices?

data.name: q3_4
data.value: Is it intended for diagnosis and monitoring?

data.name: q3_4_1
data.value: Is it intended to supply energy which will be absorbed by the human body?

data.name: q3_4_1_1
data.value: Is it only intended to illuminate the patient's body, in the visible spectrum?

data.name: q3_4_1_2
data.value: Does it supply energy different than light in the visible spectrum?

data.name: q3_4_1_3
data.value: Is it intended to image in vivo distribution of radiopharmaceuticals?

data.name: q3_4_2
data.value: Is it intended to allow direct diagnosis or monitoring of vital physiological processes?

data.name: q3_4_2_1
data.value: Are the vital physiological processes such as the patient may be in immediate danger if the vary (example: variations in cardiac performance, respiration, activity of the central nervous system)?

data.name: q3_4_2_2
data.value: Is the device intended for diagnosis and monitoring?

data.name: q3_4_3
data.value: Is it intended to emit ionizing radiation for diagnostics?

data.name: q3_5
data.value: Is it a software?

data.name: q3_5_1
data.value: Is it intended to provide information which is used to take decisions with diagnosis or therapeutic purposes?

data.name: q3_5_1_1
data.value: Does such a device have a significant impact?

data.name: q3_5_2
data.value: Is it intended to monitor physiological processes?

data.name: q3_5_2_1
data.value: Does it monitor parameters?

data.name: q3_6
data.value: Is it intended to administer and/or remove medicinal products, body liquids or other substances to or from the body?

data.name: q3_6_1
data.value: Is this done in a manner that is potentially hazardous (taking account of the nature of the substances involved, of the part of the body concerned and of the mode of application)?

data.name: q4
data.value: Does your device incorporate a medicinal product with an ancillary function?

data.name: q5
data.value: Is it used for contraception or prevention of the transmission of sexually transmitted diseases?

data.name: q5_1
data.value: Is it implantable or long term invasive?

data.name: q6
data.value: Is it intended specifically to be used for disinfecting, cleaning, rinsing or, where appropriate, hydrating contact lenses?

data.name: q7
data.value: Is it intended specifically to be used for disinfecting or sterilising medical devices that are not contact lenses ? NOTE: If it is only intended for cleaning and only by physical action, this rule does not apply.

data.name: q7_1
data.value: Is it a disinfecting solution or washer-disinfector, intended specifically to be used for disinfecting invasive devices, as the end point of processing?

data.name: q7_3
data.value: Is it specifically intended for recording of diagnostic images generated by X-ray radiation?

data.name: q8
data.value: Is it manufactured utilizing tissues or cells of human or animal origin, or their derivatives, which are non-viable or rendered non-viable?

data.name: q9
data.value: Does it incorporate or contain nanomaterials?

data.name: q9_1
data.value: What is the potential for internal exposure?

data.name: q10
data.value: Is it intended to administer medicinal products by inhalation, being an invasive device with respect to body orifices, other than surgically invasive devices?

data.name: q10_1
data.value: Does its mode of action have an essential impact on the efficacy and safety of the administered medicinal product?

data.name: q10_2
data.value: Is it intended to treat life-threatening conditions?

data.name: q11
data.value: Is it composed of substances or of combinations of substances that are intended to be introduced into the human body via a body orifice or applied to the skin and that are absorbed by or locally dispersed in the human body?

data.name: q11_1
data.value: Is it or it products of metabolism, systemically absorbed by the human body in order to achieve the intended purpose?

data.name: q11_2
data.value: Does it achieve its intended purpose in the stomach or lower gastrointestinal tract and it, or its products of metabolism, is systemically absorbed by the human body?

data.name: q11_3
data.value: Is it applied to the skin or is it applied in the nasal or oral cavity as far as the pharynx, and achieve the intended purpose on those cavities?

data.name: q12
data.value: Is it an active therapeutic device with an integrated or incorporated diagnostic function that includes an integrated or incorporated diagnostic function which significantly determines the patient management by the device (example: closed loop systems or automated external defibrillators)?

data.name: q2_1_1_2
data.value: Is it intended for short-term use?

data.name: q2_1_1_4
data.value: Is it indended for long-term use?
